title: Malaysia could build 120-kilometer connection across Malacca Strait
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
A new route – either a bridge or a tunnel – spanning 120 kilometers is planned by a private consortium to link Malaysia’s coast in Malacca with a landing point in the adjacent Riau province of Indonesia’s island of Sumatra,

The post Malaysia could build 120-kilometer connection across Malacca Strait appeared first on Investvine.
